verses.text: 1 "JESUS_END"Now concerning spiritual gifts, brethren, I would not have you ignorant.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-2/" title="1 Corinthians 12:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2  "JESUS_END"Ye know that ye were Gentiles, carried away unto these dumb idols, even as ye were led.
3 "JESUS_END"Wherefore I give you to understand, that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed: and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord, but by the Holy Ghost.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-4/" title="1 Corinthians 12:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4  "JESUS_END"Now there are diversities of gifts, but the same Spirit.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-5/" title="1 Corinthians 12:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5  "JESUS_END"And there are differences of administrations, but the same Lord.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-6/" title="1 Corinthians 12:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6  "JESUS_END"And there are diversities of operations, but it is the same God which worketh all in all.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-7/" title="1 Corinthians 12:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7  "JESUS_END"But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-8/" title="1 Corinthians 12:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8  "JESUS_END"For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit;

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-9/" title="1 Corinthians 12:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9  "JESUS_END"To another faith by the same Spirit; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit;
10 "JESUS_END"To another the working of miracles; to another prophecy; to another discerning of spirits; to another divers kinds of tongues; to another the interpretation of tongues:

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-11/" title="1 Corinthians 12:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11  "JESUS_END"But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will.
12 "JESUS_END"For as the body is one, and hath many members, and all the members of that one body, being many, are one body: so also is Christ.
13 "JESUS_END"For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body, whether we be Jews or Gentiles, whether we be bond or free; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-14/" title="1 Corinthians 12:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14  "JESUS_END"For the body is not one member, but many.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-15/" title="1 Corinthians 12:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15  "JESUS_END"If the foot shall say, Because I am not the hand, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-16/" title="1 Corinthians 12:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16  "JESUS_END"And if the ear shall say, Because I am not the eye, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?
17 "JESUS_END"If the whole body were an eye, where were the hearing? If the whole were hearing, where were the smelling?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-18/" title="1 Corinthians 12:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18  "JESUS_END"But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body, as it hath pleased him.
19 "JESUS_END"And if they were all one member, where were the body?
20 "JESUS_END"But now are they many members, yet but one body.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-21/" title="1 Corinthians 12:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21  "JESUS_END"And the eye cannot say unto the hand, I have no need of thee: nor again the head to the feet, I have no need of you.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-22/" title="1 Corinthians 12:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22  "JESUS_END"Nay, much more those members of the body, which seem to be more feeble, are necessary:
23 "JESUS_END"And those members of the body, which we think to be less honourable, upon these we bestow more abundant honour; and our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness.
24 "JESUS_END"For our comely parts have no need: but God hath tempered the body together, having given more abundant honour to that part which lacked:
25 "JESUS_END"That there should be no schism in the body; but that the members should have the same care one for another.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-26/" title="1 Corinthians 12:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26  "JESUS_END"And whether one member suffer, all the members suffer with it; or one member be honoured, all the members rejoice with it.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-27/" title="1 Corinthians 12:27 KJV verse detail"><span id="29" class="versehover">27  "JESUS_END"Now ye are the body of Christ, and members in particular.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-28/" title="1 Corinthians 12:28 KJV verse detail"><span id="30" class="versehover">28  "JESUS_END"And God hath set some in the church, first apostles, secondarily prophets, thirdly teachers, after that miracles, then gifts of healings, helps, governments, diversities of tongues.
29 "JESUS_END"Are all apostles? are all prophets? are all teachers? are all workers of miracles?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-30/" title="1 Corinthians 12:30 KJV verse detail"><span id="32" class="versehover">30  "JESUS_END"Have all the gifts of healing? do all speak with tongues? do all interpret?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-31/" title="1 Corinthians 12:31 KJV verse detail"><span id="33" class="versehover">31  "JESUS_END"But covet earnestly the best gifts: and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way.
